text:
This is not so much a bug but a compatibility issue.

Apache will not install while CommuniGate pro email server is running. During 
the recent update to 2.0.40, I discovered that the Apache services on Win32 
will not install as long as CommuniGate is running on the same server. The 
install completes but the Apache server refuses to start with no error in event 
logs or /log/error. The Apache service does not appear in the MMC "Services" 
snap in or in the Task Manager as running. If CommuniGate pro is stopped before 
attemting to install Apache the services are installed & started correctly. 
ComminiGate will also need to be stopped before Apache server is 
restarted/started. This may or may not be version specific as CommuniGate has 
only recently been installed on the server.
creator: randall@johnsoncpu.com
wrowe@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 8925 ***
